title: WTB - looking for a sweet cap or Piedmont pack
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: WTB - looking for a sweet cap or Piedmont pack
posts.post_content:
As the title says, I'm looking to pick up a pack or two that are from the right time period as the T206 set.  Either Sweet Cap or Piedmont packs would be fine... PREFERABLY graded. I know GAI graded a ton of these.

I sold a couple in the past few years and am kicking myself for doing so!

PM me please if you have one
